attributes.action: A way to stop people's property's from flooding
attributes.additional_details: I can show the plans to environmental agency
attributes.background: I have a design that can be used to stop the flooding. Homeowners would be able to get insurance on the properties. I can get plans drawn up that the government can use.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. 

You could write directly to the Environment Agency to show them your plans:

http://apps.environment-agency.gov.uk/contact/default.aspx
